location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter forwards a copy of a letter, dated 17 November 1810, from F[rancis] Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to John Elphinstone [Elphinston], Civil Auditor, which sets out the Government's regulations regarding pension payments.
